name: KittyZ: Cat Simulator where you can ride
name_original: KittyZ: Cat Simulator where you can ride
description:
The most famous kitten of the store, now in this this spectacular game of cat simulator: of all simulation games none is more original. You can control your cat to walk, run and search for all items and coins.
In addition, if you get the helmet you can pilot a powerful motocross bike and travel the entire map at high speed, making spins, tricks and spectacular jumps, as the best enduro pilots in the world.
Plus your kitty can ride a horse !! It is well written. Your cat can ride a horse to navigate the map at high speed, climb obstacles and crush objects. To access certain places, such as opening the door of the horse, you need some items that are spread across the map, collect as many as you can.
You can also drive a racing car.
Collect as many coins as you can, the harder the more valuable they are. Beat your record day by day and challenge your friends.

characteristics
* The most original cat simulator game from the store is free
* Wonderful 3d simulator
* Put a helmet on your cat and pilot a motocross bike
* Pilot a race car!
* Ride on a nice horse
* Performs pirouettes and jumps, climbs to roofs and climbs the ramps
* Free game
